notesStmt.note: Text breaks (Mishnah endings) marked by sof pasuḳ; Bikkurim III 2 ולמשכים היה – IV 2 [..שוה ל[אנשים. chapters subdivided into numbered Mishnayot.

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 2; lines: 24; ruling method: left rule is justified with a filler (broken "א").
